name: Al Filo de la Ludum Dare (LD47 entry)
name_original: Al Filo de la Ludum Dare (LD47 entry)
description:
Ludum Dare 47 Entry made with Unity and Bolt.

The theme was "Stuck in a loop".
It´s a conversational adventure that takes place during Ludum Lare.
The language is Spanish.

Just press A  B  C  or SPACE key
